# coder users show

Show a single user. Use 'me' to indicate the currently authenticated user.
## Usage
```console
coder users show <username|user_id|'me'> [flags]
```

## Examples
```console
  $ coder users show me 
```


## Local Flags
| Name |  Default | Usage |
| ---- |  ------- | ----- |
| --output, -o | table | <code>Output format. Available formats: table, json</code>|
